article.headline: Davidson 79, Elon University 60
article.story: DAVIDSON, N.C. (AP) -- Ian Johnson and Jason Morton each scored 18 points to lead Davidson to a 79-60 victory over Elon in a Southern Conference game Friday night. Brendan Winters had 11 points for the Wildcats (12-7, 6-2 Southern Conference), and Matt McKillop had 10. Chris Chalko led the Phoenix (10-10, 6-1) with 18 points and Scottie Rice had 15. Jackson Atoyebi came off the bench to score 13. Davidson led 43-27 at halftime and built its lead to 20 points at 47-27 early in the second half. Elon threatened with an 11-2 scoring run keyed by two 3-pointers from Chalko and one from Rice. Morton responded with two 3-pointers, and the Wildcats extended their lead to 57-40 with 13 minutes to play. The Phoenix never got closer than 15 the rest of the game.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
